TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServerWebConfig extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IServerWebConfig

summary.span: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

span.span: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

summary.span: Can also add component entries to the file for COM interfaces being published in the application.

span.span: Can also add component entries to the file for COM interfaces being published in the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks でインターネット インフォメーション サービス (IIS) 6.0 SOAP 対応の COM + アプリケーションの仮想ルートの作成時に、Web.config ファイルを作成するクラスを使用します。The class is used to create a Web.config file during creation of a virtual root in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application. XML 要素をアプリケーションに追加されるコンポーネント インターフェイスの Web.config ファイルに追加ことできますも。It also can add XML elements to the Web.config file for component interfaces being added to the application. .NET Framework によって内部的に使用されます。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. コード内で直接使用する必要はありません。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

summary.span: Adds XML elements to a Web.config file for a COM interface being published in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

span.span: Adds XML elements to a Web.config file for a COM interface being published in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定した型のメソッドは、Web.config ファイルに追加、``と``の子要素として、``次の XPath を持つ要素。For the specified type, the method adds to the Web.config file the `` and `` elements as children of the `` element with the following XPath: `/configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service` `AssemblyName`、 `TypeName`、 `ProgId`、および`WkoMode`パラメーターが追加された要素を 2 つの属性値に組み込まれます。The `AssemblyName`, `TypeName`, `ProgId`, and `WkoMode` parameters are incorporated into the attribute values of the two added elements. 呼び出すことはできません直接です。 should not be called directly. 代わりを呼び出して、メソッドです。Instead, call the method.

summary.span: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application so that the file is ready to have XML elements added for COM interfaces being published.

span.span: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application so that the file is ready to have XML elements added for COM interfaces being published.

remarks.format: ## Remarks メソッドを次の XPath を持つ空要素の階層を含む Web.config ファイルを作成します。The method creates a Web.config file that contains the hierarchy for an empty element with the following XPath: ``` /configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service ``` インスタンス化ではなく、クラスのオブジェクトと呼び出し元を直接呼び出して、メソッドです。Instead of instantiating a class object and calling directly, call the method.
